name: BES Management
overview:
BES Management Limited is a joint venture company owned by Davy and BDO and is authorised by the Financial Regulator under the Investment Intermediaries Act, 1995. We are the longest running BES Manager in the country.

Our team has substantial experience in the BES market having invested approximately â‚¬120 million over the last 15 years. We raised our first BES Fund in 1995 and since then we have successfully raised and invested 17 BES Funds. These funds have been invested in over 137 indigenous Irish companies across a wide range of industry sectors.
